name: 00:00:00 [Demo/Unfinished]
description:
Just click through - and choose wisely! 

(Just kidding, this is a prototype we came up with during Spring Break and then exams whammied us into next week and suddenly it was the deadline. We hope to add a lot more features like a  cooking mini-game, more choices and branching endings, those CGs that stayed as sketches, and of course, an ending in general. For now...)

You are the Evil Villain, Most Heinous Overlord to Ever Grace - er - Defile! This Continent. Dreadfully, your fated rival has woken up! It'll be months before they reach you, of course, but before then you must plot your dastardly deeds. And  then -

You wake up.

Credits

BG Art + Writing: Adwen

Sprite Art + all the cool effects + finding the sound: BeEEezZZzZ
